ATTR####EnumThenCIDRMask####azurerm_virt: If azurerm_virtual_hub_connection.a.internet_security_enabled is of certain value, Then azurerm_virtual_hub_connection.a.routing.static_vnet_route.address_prefixes has certain CIDR mask length restrictions
